headline: Marina Ovsyannikova Is Free
description:
Russian woman Marina Ovsyannikova was fined an equivalent of $270 and is now free. She may still be charged with this new "anti fake law" that carries prison terms. I hope that this does not happen and / or she is able to leave Russia. What she did required true integrity and bravery.

Here is the background story on HN: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-03-14/putin-s-state-media-news-is-interrupted-they-re-lying-to-you
description_zh-Hans:
俄罗斯妇女Marina Ovsyannikova被处以相当于270美元的罚款，现在已经自由。她仍然可能被指控犯有新的反假法，并被判处监禁。我希望这不会发生，并且/或者她能够离开俄罗斯。她的所作所为需要真正的正直和勇敢。

以下是HN上的背景故事。 https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-03-14/putin-s-state-media-news-is-interrupted-they-re-lying-to-you
description_zh-Hant:
俄羅斯婦女Marina Ovsyannikova被處以相當於270美元的罰款，現在已經自由。她仍然可能被指控犯有新的反假法，並被判處監禁。我希望這不會發生，並且/或者她能夠離開俄羅斯。她的所作所為需要真正的正直和勇敢。

以下是HN上的背景故事。 https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-03-14/putin-s-state-media-news-is-interrupted-they-re-lying-to-you
